com.reactivecascade.util

Class BindingContextUtil.DefaultBindingContext<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.util.BindingContextUtil.DefaultBindingContext<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object which will control these state changes
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBindingContext<T>
    Enclosing class:
    BindingContextUtil

    public static class BindingContextUtil.DefaultBindingContext<T>
extends Object
implements IBindingContext<T>
    The default implementation of a state-change notification to start and stop data-driven reactive actions
